description:
Subaru awakens to find himself in a classroom... with Emilia as the homeroom teacher?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Re: Petit - Re: Petit kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Petit 1 - Sairai no Gakkou
